did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: The Blue Sky Press, Chicago, Illinois 1899-1974
did.abstract: Photocopy of typescript seminar paper, concerning the history of Blue Sky Press. This press was founded in Chicago in 1899 by Thomas Wood Stevens, Alden Charles Noble, and Alfred G. Langworthy. It was in operation until 1907. Includes an annotated bibliography of publications issued by the press.
